Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: kingyjj
Reviews.Content: bit worried staying hotel reading reviews hotel location staff 1 min walk 2 metro stations metro stations walking distance staff friendly helpful giving easy directions stayed family 2 adults 2 children enjoyed stay breakfast beds comfortable bit noisy door location staff worth staying enjoyed stay madrid definately stay tech

Reviews.Title: “Not good stay away from it”
Reviews.Author: Sergio T
Reviews.Content: stayed nights third world hotel convenient central location minimum standards lodging woould close star hotel air conditioning staff replied windows night ans block gran via noise decent sleep mention fighting street middle staff re pretty decent except lying climate issue steaming system climate control dont dont waste ur valuable leisure time

Reviews.Title: “Make sure you find the right hotel”
Reviews.Author: thetunnery
Reviews.Content: stayed nights weekend finding hotel 3 hotels close proximity similar names wonder looking reviews site people reviewed hotels definitely stayed 19 nephew booked ordinary double economy couldnt tell difference ideally located centre madrid werent english tv cnn free wifi buffet breakfast €7 person adequate handy hotel madrid couple nights fits bill

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: twosisters2737
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 girl friends quadruple stayed 3 nights staff friendly helpful hotel little tired perfectly clean near lift didnt hear lift clean adequate double 2 singles pushed bed top bunk wasnt easy access getting looked pretty difficult ladder wasnt safest ive seen aside beds pillows uncomfortable add location perfect gran via restaurants shops walked definitely stay hotel price location worst hotel stay id class slightly budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced, yet Grubby”
Reviews.Author: Rebrites
Reviews.Content: tons ok stay madrid especially gran via neighborhood stranded late airplane internet access stab touted corte ingles travel agency chamartin mistake 80 euros treated rudely desk staff shabby lobby twice locked dysfunctional key system shocked faulty lightswitch kept awake lumpy thin mattress conversations people rugs threadbare corners grimy recently serious haircut bathroom disgusting

Reviews.Title: “it is not what it seems”
Reviews.Author: dianam_11
Reviews.Content: hall mess 1 ugly hotel lift wasn´t double bed barely walk therethe pictures don´t represent reality construction street terrible noise center madrid hard informations hotel tech wrongs informations

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: foodwriter007
Reviews.Content: trip madrid hotel clean comfortable cool location perfect walking distance walked el la latina plaza del sol 3 blocks plaza mayor botin etc safe friendly staff loved

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: DanNewYork
Reviews.Content: positives double bed spacious person cramped free wifi bathroom location crowded touristic zone prefer quieter neighborhood negatives reviewers noted cold rude desk staff spend time eyes glued computer screen piece advice hotel managers block internet access reception desk computer hotel tatty ragged appearance third adverts accurate claim laptop none mine friends laptop stuck keyboard spilled feeling management trying maintain gloss tech ignored basics cleaning hall carpet opinion worth price
